description: The file is an HTML webpage for a Database Viewer application, containing the structure, styles, and client-side script for interacting with databases, tables, and displaying data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database entry to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads table data and displays it in a tabular format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders table data into HTML table format.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell content, handling object expansion and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing cell content for objects and long text.
